Text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM OFFICE OF THE CHAIRMANavailable Monday October Friday October Click here to begin survey wipiasprDsDNDMVPYST There are a few things we want you to remember about The Pulse Your survey responses will be confidential We will respond actively to your comments We are going to do our best to cure some of the current problems that exist and put into action preventati ve processes that will help identify smaller problems before they become major ones We may ask for your help in resolving some of the issues that are collected in the survey your active role will help us identify the best solutions In last years survey you identified several problem areas regarding internal communications and weve already acted on many of your recommendations These are a few of the things weve accomplished or are working on in direct response to your input Require all executives VP and above to attend the Executive Impact Influence course which is a degree program designed to improve leadership and communication skills By yearend more than percent wil l have attended this course with the remaining percent to be trained in t he first quarter of Offer all employees online communication courses These courses will be available in the first quarter of Improve our online communication tools beginning in the fourth quarter w Simplify and standardize Enron directories w Educate all employees about the availability and usage of IT tools w Promote intelligentresponsible use of email Introduce Participation Dissent PD sessions to provide a vehicle fo r solving problems addressing issues and developing new opportunities This application will launch in the first quarter of in the ThinkBank on eThink So take a few minutes to check your pulse and tell us what you think and ho w you feel about your job and about Enron
